name: Crayon Shin-chan: Burst Serving! Kung Fu Boys - Ramen Rebellion
description: Crayon Shin-chan: Burst Serving! Kung Fu Boys - Ramen Rebellion is a movie starring Akiko Yajima. Shin-chan and the Kasukabe Defense Group are planning to perform an absolutely no-stunt Kung Fu challenge on the stage in Aiya Town,...
